Description:
Detects System Information Discovery commands

Author: Pawel Mazur
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: System Information Discovery - Auditd
Query: sourcetype='linux-auditd' eql select * from _source_ where ((type = 'execve' and a0 = 'kmod' and a1 = 'list') or (type = 'path' and (process_path = '/etc/lsb-release' or process_path = '/etc/redhat-release' or process_path = '/etc/issue')) or (type = 'execve' and (a0 = 'uname' or a0 = 'uptime' or a0 = 'lsmod' or a0 = 'hostname' or a0 = 'env')) or (type = 'execve' and a0 = 'grep' and (a1 like '%vbox%' or a1 like '%vm%' or a1 like '%xen%' or a1 like '%virtio%' or a1 like '%hv%')))
